content.question: A difference between command and market economic systems is that command economic systems

choices.label: have a legal system that provides incentives to produce, whereas market economic systems do not
ensure efficiency, whereas market economic systems ensure equity
limit individual property rights, whereas market economic systems protect individual property rights
maximize producer and consumer surplus, whereas market economic systems do not
regulate production but not distribution, whereas market economic systems regulate both production and distribution

content.answer: limit individual property rights, whereas market economic systems protect individual property rights

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
